name: oater
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a western (= a film based on stories about life in the west of the US in the past): This oater is the only movie directed by Burt Lancaster. Forty Guns is a 1957 oater about an infamous lawman who takes on a female outlaw and her private army of 40 gunmen.
More examplesFewer examplesTrimble is the female lead in an 1950s oater called "Last Stage to El Paso".Fritz Lang's first western is a routine but well-made oater that addresses one of the director's favourite themes: obsessive vengefulness.The presence of those two great stars in the same place is the selling point of this otherwise routine oater.
